title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant' is displayed. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Please provide an explanation of the meaning of this error message.
OB: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant' is displayed.
EB: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant' is displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the application. 2. Open a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant). 3. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy. 4. Observe the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
